title: Luxe Wayanad Hill Station Stay with Daily Breakfast & Guided Nature Walk
description:
Nestled on a hill far away from crowds, hidden within the tea, rubber, coffee and cardamom plantations of Wayanad is The Windflower Resort & Spa Vythiri, a hill station paradise waiting to be discovered. A true slice of heaven, this luxe retreat invites you to experience serenity and inhale crisp mountain air - all less than three hours from Calicut International Airport and easily accessible from Bengaluru and Chennai. 

The Windflower Resort & Spa Vythiri also offers splendid views of the famed Chembra peak and the verdant rainforests of the Western Ghats. And that's not all: this nature retreat boasts an award-winning spa where you can rejuvenate with a wide range of Ayurvedic and Balinese massages.
offer_address: Annapoorna Estate, Survey No. 40/ 2B, Resurvey No. 330/1, Vythiri Taluk, Achoornam, Kerala 673575, India

title: Green Oasis Getaway - Wayanad, Kerala
description: Escape to the enchanting Sharoy Resort in Wayanad, a green paradise in Kerala. Take a break from city life and immerse yourself in nature at this prestigious resort, stamped with Tripadvisorâ€™s Certificate of Excellence. With daily breakfast and three 3-course meals (lunch or dinner) for two included.

title: Swiss Chalet-Inspired Western Ghats Escape with Daily Dining
description:
Let tranquillity embrace you at Morickap Resort, a brand-new property nestled in the lap of the majestic Western Ghats in the scenic hill station of Wayanad. Located within driving distance of Bangalore and Kozhikode, this green paradise in Kerala is perfect for those seeking a secluded and relaxing escape.

Reconnect with nature without compromising on modern luxuries with daily breakfast, daily dinner and one 30-minute massage each per stay.

**Travelling as a family?** One child (aged five years and under) stays free on existing bedding with breakfast included.
offer_address: Morickap Road Pinangode P O, Vengapally Village Vythiri, Kalpetta, Kerala 673122
